law.catch_line: Devise or bequest extends to an execution of power.
law.text: A devise or bequest extends to any real or personal estate over which the testator has any power of appointment, and to which it would apply if the estate was his own property, and shall operate as an execution of such power, unless a contrary intention appears in the will.
law.history: Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 8, effective 16, 1972. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4845.
